content.para: The 3.15.1 fixes a small bug in .NET release that could throw unchecked exceptions on inaccessible current working directory (for example when run as a service process).

td.p: The .NET build of Carrot2 could fail with an unchecked exception thrown from the underlying I/O subsystem if the process's current working directory was inaccessible. This bugfix works around the problem.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
